name: AskRBG
0:
”Alexa ask RBG about keeping her cool”
”Alexa ask RBG about the me too movement”
”Alexa ask RBG about the next generation of feminists”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: r. b. g.
des: ‘Ask RBG’ is a companion skill to Jeffrey Rosen’s new audiobook ‘Conversations with RBG.’ This skill features real-life interviews with RBG. From the #metoo movement to how she keeps her cool, the interviews cover RBG’s many years as a Supreme Court justice. Listen to the audiobook edition of ‘Conversations with RBG’ for more interviews, featured as bonus content.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
